game.name: Saccharine Echo
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Saccharine Echo is a story that walks the line between psychological drama and dark paranormal romance. Your choices will shape the fate of a young woman haunted by an obsessive entity from another world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Saccharine Echo is a story that walks the line between psychological drama and dark paranormal romance. Your choices will shape the fate of a young woman haunted by an obsessive entity from another world.
